body.name: VEGCOO C10 Wireless Gaming Mouse Rechargeable Silent Optical Mice 7 Colors LED Lights, 7 Buttons 2400/1600/800DPI (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 9 mins
features: Amazing LED Light: Our wireless gaming mouse can randomly change color into 7 different color schemes, creating amazing feelings for gaming or working. The light up mouse has a soft light that is not distracting when using it.Lights can be turned off if not needed.

Stable and Accurate Tracking: Our RGB wireless mouse provides a stable connection between the USB receiver and computer via 2. 4GHz wireless technology. The wireless RGB mouse comes with a sensitive optical sensor that provides precise and free movement.

Silent Clicking: We are not only a computer mouse for office, but also a silent gaming mouse, the left and right buttons are silent to protect you from harsh clicking noises. You can enjoy leisure or work time without disturbing others around you.

Environmentally friendly battery: The gaming mouse wireless usb has a built-in 600mAh lithium rechargeable battery, which is rechargeable. ✨ Equipped with a USB port charging cable, you can also use the mouse while charging. With the rechargeble gaming mouse wireless, you don't have to worry about the mouse running out of battery anymore.

Comfortable Feel:wireless mouse for laptop with natural curve design, comfortable material and medium size keeps your hands in good shape. The shortcut thumb side button realizes the function of turning pages forward and backward, allowing you to turn pages freely.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cool Breathing Colors Cool breathing color creating a ideal atmosphere for playing. Light ON/OFF depends on your needs for the design of a singe switch. Built-in Rechargeable Battery The high-quality 400mAh rechargeable battery promises a longer battery life. And you can even use the mouse when it is recharging. Navigating the Internet Easily Two side buttons achieve the function of page forward and page backward. The clickable scroll wheel can downward/upward the website page quickly. Ease to Set Up Plug in the USB receiver, switch it on and you are all set.

Widely Compatible Windows 7/8/10 Windows XP(64) Windows Vista Mac OS X Silent Click The mouse's left and right buttons can reach the standard of silent click, so you don't have to worry about disturbing your family when you game or work at night. Adjustable DPI 800/1600/2400 three-speed adjustable DPI can perfectly adapt to your needs, whether it is daily work or games, you can get greater control and precision. Wide range of uses This mouse can be used for design, gaming, work and home use.

Tips for helping mouse work 1. The data cable can only be used for charging and cannot help the computer recognize the mouse. And the USB receiver can help the computer identify and connect the mouse. So when using the mouse, you need to plug the USB receiver into the USB port of the computer. 2. The USB receiver is under the mouse, please remove the USB receiver from USB slot with your fingernails. If there is no USB receiver, please feel free to contact VEGCOO. 3. Please charge the mouse for about 2 hours before first time use it. 4. When you do not use it over 8 minutes, the mouse will enter into sleeping mode, you can click any button to wake it up. 5. It's out of power if the mouse cursor moves slowly or stop moving. 6. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging, and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged.

Package Includes 1* Wireless mouse 1* Charging cable 1* USB receiver 1* English Manual Specification Type: Silent Wireless Mouse Dimension:13*7*3.5cm/5.12*2.76*1.38in Net Weight: 0.155kg/5.47oz Wireless Distance: 10m Receiver: Nano receiver Colors: Black Buttons: 6 DPI:800-1600-2400 Battery: 400mAh Lithium battery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing price for such a superb mouse. It's very comfortable (especially if you have long fingers like me because it has a longer build compared to some other mice) and has decent cursor sensitivity for gaming. All the buttons and the scroller work well and efficiently. The mouse was less bright than I anticipated, but the lights still shifted smoothly through the colors. I thought a nice feature was that you could have the lights on or off, if you want to save power but still keep the mouse on.The one thing that seemed to be a consistent problem was that after about a year, it refused to charge properly for me. It kept spitting the charger out and it would take a long time since you had to force it back in after a little while.Other than that, I faced no problems with this mouse. Would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless light up mouse!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently won a color lit keyboard and decided to try and find a mouse to match. I bought this for work in an office and love the fact that it’s wireless as my mouse sits too far for a wired version to reach the back of the PC tower. Setup was very easy and it connected right away to the Windows 10 PC I use at work. The colors fade in and out nicely as shown in the video and are vida le even when in daylight. You can still use it while it’s being charged, it’s just slightly inconvenient for me because I have to run the cable down the front of my desk to the front of the tower, but I knew that when I bought it. The charge lasts for about one week as I end up charging it on Monday or Tuesday most weeks. It is very comfortable to hold, but do be careful of the buttons on the side as they click very easily and one functions as a “back” key, so I lost something I was keying in online when I hit it with the inside of my thumb when trying to move the mouse. The nice thing is how silent it really is! The scroll is super quiet and you virtually can not hear the finger clicks. Overall I love this mouse and actually purchased another to gift one to my brother, who is a gamer and also liked it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slightly quirky, but no real complaints
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Good size for my smallish hands, fairly comfortable to hold. Light weight could be a pro or con depending on your personal preferences. Charges pretty quickly with any micro USB cable you have in your junk drawer. Battery life has been great - I use it several hours a day and only have to charge it every week or two. Scroll wheel and clicks have a nice feel to them and are actually much quieter than my previous, more expensive "silent" mouse! CPI options are fine for the average user. It's been dropped many times in the 7 months that I've had it, and came out unscathed. Overall it's been serving me well.Cons: The build quality isn't exactly impressive and there are some rough edges to the plastic around the scroll wheel. And mine might just be defective, but the "breathing" lights are not properly synchronized and will eventually become a muddled mess of colors. It looks kind of cool that way IMO but may bother others. Also, if left alone for too long, it goes into sort of a half sleep mode where it's super slow and laggy and you have to switch it off and back on to restore normal function.Overall: Not much to complain about. It's a pretty cool little mouse and I love not having to buy batteries anymore. If you can get it for less than $15 then go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I use this for my engineering school work (solidworks, CAD, etc) and a little gaming (GTA V) and it works well for the price. It feels of a decent weight but is nice and lightweight. The usb dongle storage at the bottom makes it easy to put in my backpack and take to class. The lights are cool but the green and yellow colors don’t show up as well. After a period of inactivity it will turn off on its own which is nice but I find myself having to switch it off and back on when I come back to it. These little things hardly impeded on the rating since the product does what it said it would and was cheap for what you get. Good for productivity in style. Not a gamer but I would say it’s good for that but maybe not the best. I would spend a little extra money for a nice gaming mouse with more dpi settings. I really like the mouse overall and recommend you try it as it won’t hurt your budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good feel, comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Feels good in hand, solid clicks, very light weight. Definitely a solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: So I had a mouse before this one and I used it on my chromebook. But I got another just for my Macbook, and it works great. I always use a monitor with my Mac so I have something connected to it for it to work. I plug the usb in that so I can use it. The only time the mouse glitches a little (it turns off for a slight moment then comes back on) is when I have a lot of windows and tabs open either while working or gaming. The battery life lasts so long I’ve only gad to charge it once since I’ve gotten it. So overall great mouse the lights are really pretty and so very useful!
Love it it’s my second one first one lasted 4 years but I dropped few times and broke it it and broke I like that changes color for sure it’s great for gaming fits great in my hand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Does what its ment to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 22, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have struggled to find a decent mouse for myself - but the search lead my 7 year old to "want a new mouse" for his laptop.He loved the idea of a changing colour mouse.ProsGood size (its good for adult hands of course - I might use it myself - if I can get over the lighting)Rechargeable - saves finding new batteries - way betterinstant pairning with the dongle - no messing with bluetooth pairingStorage for the dongle - this is a very good feature I wish everyone would followConsIt doesnt have any weight to it (some people might see this as a good thing I guess)Plastic is not the best - but for the money this is easy to overlookOverall i'd buy again - I am impressed
